0:
--------------------
Text: Tautiška giesmė ("The National Hymn"; ] ) is the national anthem of Lithuania, also known by its opening words "Lietuva, Tėvyne mūsų" (official translation of the lyrics: "Lithuania, Our Homeland", literally: "Lithuania, Our Fatherland") and as "Lietuvos himnas" (Hymn of Lithuania).
Triplets:<Tautiška giesmė
1:
--------------------
Text: Tautiška giesmė:  The music and lyrics were written in 1898 by Vincas Kudirka, when Lithuania was still part of the Russian Empire.
Triplets:<Tautiška giesmė
3:
--------------------
<Text: Tautiška giesmė:  Shortly before his death in 1899, the anthem was performed for Lithuanians living in Saint Petersburg, Russia.>
